Reviews.Title: Green line, different battery
Reviews.Author: M. Garnett
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a present for a friend. The second time pictures were copied from camera to computer a green line appeared on the lcd screen, it does not appear in the pictures but is in the way when previewing on the camera.The description of this camera lists it as taking 3 AAA batteries, it doesn't. It uses a Li-Ion battery pack. Not very impressed with this seller's (Timothy B. Swick) description. Doesn't seem like he knows much about what he's selling.

Reviews.Title: Vivitar Camera
Reviews.Author: paintedactors
Reviews.Content: Hi Guys, I love this camera. But the one thing that was disapointing was that it didnt some with an sd card. But it said it would. Overall this camera is awsome.
